recipe.title: Simple Dahl
recipe.comment: served with ancient grains and coriander
recipe.ingredient: Root veggies you have in your fridge chopped and frozen spinach
recipe.step: Soak split peas over night then put on higher heat and bring to the boil. Cook for 20 minutes. Mean while heat some olive oil in a small fry pan and cook garlic then ginger for 3-5 mins add the spices and cook a further 2 minutes. Add a little water to the pan and add to split peas. Add all the veggies and cook until veggies are soft (about 30-40 mins.) Add spinach and stir until completely mixed through. Serve with ancient grains and coriander sprinkled on top.
